short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Verify the cryptocurrency addresses you input into webpages are correct

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whether you're new to crypto or a seasoned degen, sending cryptocurrency between various dapps and exchanges is scary. This extension allows you to create an address book of your verified correct cryptocurrency addresses and will allow you to seamlessly verify that the cryptocurrency address you inputted onto the current page matches one from your address book

Features
- Create, edit, and remove verified cryptocurrency addresses, which are only stored locally in your Chrome browser for security purposes
- Check in realtime if cryptocurrency addresses you inputted on the current tab are verified (an alert will display if the address is verified)
- Verify button in the Crypto Degen Buddy chrome extension popup that allows you to double check the cryptocurrency address you inputted on the current tab is verified

This chrome extension's code is open source at https://github.com/stuckinaboot/crypto-degen-buddy
